name: Simple Score-Based Risk Assessment
description: Classifies risk profiles based on simple score thresholds

profiles.name: Very Conservative
profiles.description: Focus on preserving capital with minimal risk. Suited for short-term goals or those with low risk tolerance.

profiles.name: Conservative
profiles.description: Emphasis on stability with modest growth potential. Appropriate for short to medium-term goals.

profiles.name: Moderate
profiles.description: Balanced approach with moderate growth potential and moderate risk.

profiles.name: Growth-Oriented
profiles.description: Focus on long-term growth with higher risk tolerance. Suitable for longer time horizons.

profiles.name: Aggressive
profiles.description: Maximizing growth potential with high risk tolerance. Best for long-term goals and those comfortable with volatility.
